description: The wife of a Longport, New Jersey, commissioner was one of the seven people killed in a fiery plane crash in Massachusetts.
title: Jet Crash Victim Texted Husband Minutes Before
title_page: Jet Crash Victim Texted Husband Minutes Before
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
BY NBCPhiladelphia.com
The wife of a Longport, New Jersey, commissioner was one of the seven people killed in a fiery plane crash in Massachusetts.
Longport Mayor Nick Russo told NBC10â€™s Ted Greenberg that Anne Leeds, the 74-year-old wife of James Leeds, died in the accident. Mr. Leeds later confirmed his wife's death.
Mr. Leeds said he received a text from Anne just four minutes before the crash saying they were about to take off.
